Rename Item

Change the name of an item.

Request

  • Requires authentication

  • HTTP Method: PUT

  • URL: Value of item’s href attribute. (e.g., http://my.cl.ly/1912565)

  • Body:

    {
  "item": {
    "name": "Betelgeuse"
  }
}

Response

  • Status: 200 OK

  • Body:

    {
  "href":         "http://my.cl.ly/items/1912565",
  "name":         "Betelgeuse",
  "private":      false,
  "url":          "http://cl.ly/2wt6",
  "content_url":  "http://cl.ly/2wt6/content",
  "item_type":    "bookmark",
  "view_counter": 0,
  "icon":         "http://my.cl.ly/images/item_types/bookmark.png",
  "remote_url":   null,
  "redirect_url": "http://getcloudapp.com",
  "created_at":   "2010-10-23T21:15:21Z",
  "updated_at":   "2010-10-24T01:38:28Z",
  "deleted_at":   null
}

Example

curl --digest -u arthur@dent.com:towel \
     -H "Accept: application/json" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -d \
       '{
          "item": {
            "name": "Betelgeuse"
          }
        }' \
     -X PUT \
     "http://my.cl.ly/items/1912565"
